review_text: I had one of these which i burned the motor out on a few years ago.  Kept using the mini processor attachment on my blender ntil today.  Bought this same model in stainless at Big Lots for $29.  So glad to have this back in my kitchen once again. I may never have to pull out my large 11 cup Cuisinart (1992) ever again.
product_name: Cuisinart DLC-1 Mini-Prep Food Processor, White
